title.rendered: Progressive Insurance Login | Quick Access to Manage Account

content.rendered:
Progressive Insurance login allows customers to easily manage their insurance accounts online. With a few clicks, customers can access their policy information, make payments, view ID cards, and more. This page highlights the convenience and quick access provided by Progressive Insurance login for managing your insurance account.

Headings On this Page

Toggle
  • Benefits of Progressive Insurance Login
  • Key Facts About Progressive Insurance
  • Progressive Insurance Login
  • Progressive Insurance Forgot Password
  • Progressive Insurance Customer Care
  • Download Progressive Insurance Login App
  • How to Get Progressive Insurance Quote

Benefits of Progressive Insurance Login

Here are some benefits of logging in to your Progressive Insurance Login account:

Convenient Access to Policy Information

By logging in to your Progressive Insurance account, you can easily view and manage your policy information, such as coverage details, premiums, and deductibles.

Online Bill Payment

You can make payments on your insurance policy online, directly from your account. This can save you time and hassle compared to mailing in a check or paying in person.

Claims Management

If you need to file a claim, you can do so through your online account. You can also track the progress of your claim and communicate with a claims representative.

Policy Changes and Updates

If you need to make changes to your policy, such as adding or removing coverage, you can do so online through your account.

Snapshot Program

If you participate in the Snapshot program, which offers personalized insurance rates based on driving behavior, you can view your driving data and track your progress toward potential discounts.

Mobile Access

You can also access your Progressive Insurance account through the mobile app, allowing you to manage your policy on the go.

Key Facts About Progressive Insurance

Here are some key facts about Progressive Insurance:
  • Progressive Insurance was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Mayfield Village, Ohio, United States.
  • It is one of the largest auto insurance providers in the United States and also offers other insurance products such as home, renters, motorcycle, boat, and RV insurance.
  • The company uses a direct-to-consumer model, meaning customers can purchase insurance directly from Progressive, without going through a broker.
  • Progressive is known for its innovative approach to insurance, including being one of the first companies to offer usage-based insurance (UBI) through its Snapshot program, which uses telematics to track driving behavior and offer discounts to safe drivers.
  • As of 2021, Progressive has over 20 million customers and employs over 44,000 people across the United States.
  • The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker symbol “PGR”.
  • Progressive is also known for its advertising campaigns, featuring the popular character “Flo”, played by actress Stephanie Courtney.
  • In 2020, Progressive had total revenues of over $42 billion and a net income of over $4 billion.
  • Progressive has received numerous awards and recognition for its customer service, including being named J.D. Power’s “Auto Insurance Provider of the Year” for six consecutive years (2014-2019).
  • The company is committed to social responsibility and sustainability, with initiatives focused on reducing its environmental footprint, supporting diversity and inclusion, and giving back to communities through its Progressive Foundation.

Progressive Insurance Login

To log in to your Progressive Insurance account, you can follow these steps:
  1. Go to the Progressive Insurance login website (www.progressive.com).
  2. Click on the “Log In” button in the top right corner of the homepage.
  3. Enter your email address or username and password in the appropriate fields.
  4. Click on the “Log In” button to access your account.

Progressive Insurance Forgot Password

If you have forgotten your password for your Progressive Insurance account login, you can follow these steps to reset it:
  1. Go to the Progressive Insurance Login page (www.progressive.com).
  2. Click on the “Log In” button in the top right corner of the homepage.
  3. Click on the “Forgot username/password?” link located below the login fields.
  4. Enter the email address associated with your account and click on the “Continue” button.
  5. Follow the instructions provided to verify your identity and reset your password.

Progressive Insurance Customer Care

If you need assistance with your Progressive Insurance login or policy or have any questions, you can contact Progressive Insurance customer care in several ways:

Phone

You can call the customer care number at 1-800-776-4737. This line is available 24/7 for claims and roadside assistance. If you need help with policy changes, billing, or general questions, the line is available from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. EST, Monday through Friday, and from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. EST on Saturdays.

Online chat

You can chat with a customer service representative on the Progressive Insurance website. This service is available from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. EST, Monday through Friday, and from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. EST on Saturdays.

Email

You can send an email to Progressive Insurance customer care using the form on their website. You can expect a response within one business day.

Social media

You can reach out to Progressive Insurance customer care through their social media accounts on Twitter and Facebook. Representatives are available to respond to messages and comments during business hours.

Mail

You can send mail to the Progressive Insurance corporate headquarters at:

The Progressive Corporation

6300 Wilson Mills Rd.

Mayfield Village, Ohio 44143

Download Progressive Insurance Login App

You can download the Progressive Insurance app on your mobile device by following these steps:
  1. Open the App Store (for iOS devices) or the Google Play Store (for Android devices) on your mobile device.
  2. Search for “Progressive Insurance” in the app store search bar.
  3. Select the Progressive Insurance app from the search results.
  4. Click on the “Download” or “Install” button to begin the download process.
  5. Once the download is complete, open the app and log in to your Progressive Insurance account.

How to Get Progressive Insurance Quote

You can access a Progressive Insurance quote by following these steps:
  1. Go to the Progressive Insurance website (www.progressive.com).
  2. Click on the “Get a Quote” button in the top right corner of the homepage.
  3. Enter your zip code and click on the “Quote Now” button.
  4. Provide the required information: You will need to provide information about the vehicle you want to insure, including the make, model, year, and current mileage. You will also be asked to provide information about yourself, including your name, address, and driver’s license number.
  5. Choose your coverage: Once you have provided all the necessary information, you can customize your coverage options. Progressive Insurance offers a variety of coverage options, including liability, collision, and comprehensive coverage.
  6. Review your quote: After you have chosen your coverage options, you will receive a quote based on the information you provided. You can review the quote and make any necessary adjustments.
  7. Complete the purchase: If you are satisfied with the quote, you can complete the purchase online or by phone with a Progressive Insurance agent.
